required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of Transauricular Electrical Vagal Nerve Stimulation on Temporal Summation of Pain in Patients With Back Pain
clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Transauricular Electrical Vagal Nerve Stimulation on Temporal Summation of Heat Pain in Patients With Chronic Low-back Pain

brief_summary.textblock: The effect of transauricular electrical vagal nerve stimulation (taVNS) will be studied on temporal summation of heat pain (TSP) in 30 patients with chronic low-back pain and in 30 heathy volunteers. Participants will receive either taVNS or sham stimulation before and during TSP induction in a randomized crossover manner. The participants will be unaware regarding the type of intervention.

study_design_info.masking_description: Participants and outcome assessor will be unaware regarding the type (real or sham) taVNS intervention

primary_outcome.time_frame: Continuously 5 minutes during the experimental heat pain stimulation
primary_outcome.description: Perceived unpleasantness of pain, which participants will rate continuously during the repetitive heat stimulation using a computerized visual analogue scale (CoVAS, Medoc Advanced Medical Systems, Ramat Yishai, Israel) ranging from 0 (= not unpleasant at all) to 100 (= intolerable pain)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 10 minutes (before, during and after stimulation of heat pain)
10 minutes (before, during and after stimulation of heat pain)
secondary_outcome.description: non-invasive measurement of systolic and diastolic blood pressure

arm_group.description: taVNS will be administered to cymba conchae of both ears using ECO2-TENS device
aVNS will be administered to lobes of both ears using ECO2-TENS device

intervention.description: transauricular electrical vagal nerve stimulation will be applied to the cymba conchae of both ears using ECO2 TENS device (manufactured by Schwa-Medico GmbH/Germany) with currency intensity of max 10 mA and current frequency 2/100 Hz.
ECO2 TENS device (manufactured by Schwa-Medico GmbH/Germany)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with chronic low-back pain
- age 30-60 yrs old
- without heart disease
- low-back pain intensity at least 4 out of 10 points measured using NRS-10
- without cognitive deficits (Mini Mental State Shake < 23)
Exclusion Criteria:
- opioid medication
- more than 1 low-back surgery
- sensory of motor neurological deficits at the level of back pain
- spinal stenosis
- diabetic polyneuropathy
- skin pathology at the site (cymba conchae) of stimulation
